verbose_text: XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR Haploinsufficiency and subsequent reduced expression of ZEB1 in the corneal endothelium is thought to underlie the pathology of PPCD3, XREF_BIBR whereas inappropriate ectopic expression of OVOL2 in corneal endothelial cells is the proposed mechanism for PPCD1.
evidence: ZEB1 in the corneal endothelium is thought to underlie the pathology of PPCD3
